title: Our First Hour with Spider-Man 2
description:
This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny  to get 10% off your first month.
Get 10% off, free shipping, and a free mystery candle for every three you buy at https://immersionfragrances.com/

Tim, Andy, Greg, and Janet sat down and recorded their first hour with Spider-Man 2 and we edited it down into a one-hour super cut! Enjoy a lot of collective brain rot and HYPE!

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
